study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: Drawing on original, high-frequency panel data from very poor pastoralist communities in northern Kenya, we find suggestive evidence both of multiple dynamic equilibria consistent with the hypothesis of poverty traps and of risk management patterns
